Description: The Rest in Egypt; landscape with the Virgin and child sitting against a tree at left, the Infant John the Baptist and two putti playing with a lamb at right, Joseph asleep in background; after Peter Paul Rubens Engraving
Curator's comments: After the painting in Museo del Prado, Madrid, inv.no.1561 (Rooses 179). The same composition attributed to Rubens' studio (but with figures of St George and other saints added) is in the National Gallery, London, inv.no.NG67. Reproduces Jegher's woodcut in reverse (see Schneevoogt 25.114). For another impression see 1917,1208.497.
Bibliographic references: Schneevoogt 1873 / Catalogue des estampes gravées d'après P.P.Rubens (25.115)
Associated names: Representation of: St John the Baptist (Prodromos)
